name: Fast Wings
description:
We all sympathize with nature and its magnificent patterns and paintings that it has painstakingly created over thousands of years.
But unfortunately, from the ground, we often do not see all the beauty that a particular place has. At such moments, you want to become a bird, soar into the sky and see everything from a height...

But now, thanks to Fast Wings, you have this opportunity. This bird simulator with a third-person view allows you to see the stormy forest river in all its glory, but follow the path of the rings, be careful! At high speed, it is easy to crash into a branch and leave the feathered body...

Feature of game:
- Nice graphics and gameplay.
- Endless game mode.
- Relaxing atmosphere.
- Customization of the main character.
